entry.title: [273] Hegseth Accidentally Adds Journalist To Secret Military Groupchat
entry.summary:
Jeffrey Goldberg, editor in chief of The Atlantic, was apparently included in a Trump administration group chat on Signal in which top officials debated and then discussed details of attacks against Houthi rebels in Yemen.

The initial invite to the group apparently came from national security adviser Mike Waltz. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth reportedly sent the group details including weapons used, targets, and timing — two hours ahead of the attacks, which began March 15.

Others in the group were Vice President Vance, Secretary of State Marco Rubio, Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard and CIA Director John Ratcliffe.

In the stunning report, Goldberg claimed Waltz connected with him on Signal on March 11 and, two days later, he was invited to join a chain called the “Houthi PC small group,” in which they discussed strikes against the Houthi militant group in Yemen — seemingly unaware of the journalist’s presence in the group.

He wrote that he initially had strong doubts the text group was real, “because I could not believe that the national-security leadership of the United States would communicate on Signal about imminent war plans.”

Goldberg also said he “could not believe that the national security adviser to the president would be so reckless as to include him in the discussions with senior U.S. officials.”

He said he realized the text chain could be real after the person who was supposedly Hegseth messaged to the group that the first detonations in Yemen would be felt in two hours, at 1:45 p.m., which was in line with what took place.

>https://thehill.com/policy/defense/5211030-us-houthi-attacks-yemen/

entry.title: [ 33] Fentanyl deaths are plummeting because of biden
entry.summary:
Fentanyl deaths may be plummeting under trump, but he doesn't have anything to do with it. NPR proves that it's because of the most vulnerable users already being dead, and the ones that are left alive are using fentanyl more skillfully and carrying narcan around
Trump literally can't do anything right
https://www.npr.org/2025/03/24/nx-s1-5328157/fentanyl-overdose-death-drugs
Reporter's notebook: 8 theories why fentanyl deaths are plummeting
Over the past six months, I've been tracking something really cool and mysterious happening on American streets. For the first time in 30 years, drug deaths are plunging at a rate that addiction experts say is hopeful — but also baffling.

In the past, even the most ambitious, well-funded efforts to slow drug deaths only helped a little bit. Reducing fatal overdoses by 8% or 9% was seen as a huge win.

But now, deaths nationwide plunged more than 26% from the peak in June 2023, according to the latest preliminary data gathered by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

That means roughly 30,000 fewer people a year are dying. Many states are seeing even bigger improvements of 30% to 50%. In some states, progress has been sustained since 2021 and 2022, which suggests this isn't a temporary blip

So how did the U.S. finally turn the corner on drug deaths?
What's going on? No one knows for sure, but here are eight leading theories I hear from experts.

1. Naloxone, also known as Narcan, may be the game-changer. The Biden administration raced to make this medication, a nasal spray that quickly reverses opioid and fentanyl overdoses, far more widely available. People can buy it now over the counter without a prescription. It's distributed for free in many high-risk communities, and people using drugs often carry it. It's unclear how many lives naloxone is saving each year, but many front-line public health workers tell me the impact is huge. Learn more here.

entry.title: [ 70] ‘Incendiary’ devices found at a Tesla showroom in Texas
entry.summary:
https://www.kxan.com/news/local/austin/incendiary-devices-found-at-austin-tesla-showroom/

AUSTIN (KXAN) — Devices that were deemed “incendiary” by Austin Police were found at the northwest Austin Tesla showroom on Monday morning, police said.

APD said it responded to a call about suspicious devices at the showroom around 8:04 a.m. Monday. The APD bomb squad was called out to investigate.

The devices were “determined to be incendiary” and were taken by police without incident, APD said.

Agents with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) also responded to the scene, an agency spokesperson told KXAN.

There have been numerous instances of vandalism aimed at Tesla showrooms and cars throughout the nation in the past few weeks, ranging from cars being defaced to cars or even Tesla chargers set on fire. In one instance, the Associated Press reported an Oregon man was arrested after he was accused of throwing Molotov cocktails at a store in Salem. It prompted the Justice Department last week to investigate, with Attorney General Pam Bondi saying “The swarm of violent attacks on Tesla property is nothing short of domestic terrorism.”

entry.title: [168] /ptg/ - Private Trackers General
entry.summary:
Hag Edition

>Not sure what private trackers are all about?
A private tracker is a torrent website that provides the same functionality as a public tracker but is invite-only. Each member share common goals: collecting, preserving and discussing media.


>Have a question?
- FAQ https://archive.is/UVQkn
- WIKI https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Private_trackers
- NEWFAG PYRAMID https://inviteroute.github.io/graph or https://inviteroute.github.io/sheet/

Use >>>/g/ptg as a link to find the /ptg/ thread.

>Remember the following:
>READ THE OP BEFORE MAKING A FUCKING QUESTION YOU RETARDED FAGGOT
>It doesn't matter if you use the same username in different trackers, the staff still share your IP with each other.
>Staff is reading, being /marked/ is NOT a meme, and even if it is, it isn't.
>Don't ask for invites, it's private for a reason.
>If starting out you should interview for RED, rank to Torrent Master, wait on account age, and get invites from there. THAT'S IT THAT IS ALL YOU HAVE TO DO

entry.title: [ 48] I need a diner where...
entry.summary:
Can I visit everyday for breakfast or lunch and always eat alone and be aloof and mysterious and after I'm done can I smoke a cigar- a Charter Oak Nicaraguan leaf cigar- in the autumn wind just outside the door leaning against my 90's Nissan 300ZX with the popup headlights while staring off into the woods beyond your diner; and can an older lady be my regular waitress who knows me by name and always says
>the usual today, anon?
And I often say yes, but I'll occasionally surprise her by asking for something different; and she knows that there must have been some kind of sorrow in my past but never presses me on it and always smiles and I smile back and then one day her young and shy neice, just out of highshcool, begins working there too and she notices me there everyday and asks her aunt about me and I overhear them talking and her aunt says
>he's a good man, but you'd better be careful with his heart, sweetie
And it hurts me inside because I've been hurt before, but I think that maybe just maybe her dirty blond hair and her green eyes and youthful, pretty smile can remind me of what it means to be alive and I come back again of course I come back again and she's serving me instead of her aunt and she messes up my order by accident because she's nervous but she apologies and I accept and it's okay and I introduce myself and she introduces herself and she has such a lovely name and when she shakes my hand I can feel my heart beat again for the first time in a long time and can I take you for a drive I say can I show you the colors at the lake they're beautiful this time of year I say with the mountains in the distance say and the clouds running toward them say I say can I take you there and hold your hand and skip rocks across the water I say and can I kiss you darling Rose I say is it too soon to say I love you my love I say can I?

entry.title: [ 45] Seriously despise cooking
entry.summary: Hated cooking ever since I was a kid. Been living by myself for many years but literally never made anything that I can say "Wow this is delicious". Simply have no patience to stand like a little retard over a pan or whatever and flipping or doing whatever the "recipe" demands; can't stand the measurements - the fact that I can't do everything precisely pisses me off; also the thing that pisses me off the most is the existence of condiments - I really hate the fact that there's hundreds of different spices and sauces and shit and I don't know when they are to be used and which don't go well with each other etc, it's mega annoying. I literally don't even buy or use salt or pepper. Lastly I hate waiting for the water to start boiling, I don't care I just put it in the pot straight away. The longest food that I can be bothered to cook is to slice some chicken breasts and wait for them to boil in the pot. It's usually what I eat. For years, I've been pretty much only the following things, when it's not junk-food or take-away: boiled chicken breast; fried/boiled eggs, quickly seared pork/beef steak, quickly fried pork/beef mince. I fry on lard or butter. I have experimented with raw meat eating but I guess the brain-wash and condition runs to deep + years of taste-buds being raped by artificial shit are showing its results: it's more difficult for me to eat raw meat than cooked (talking purely about the chewing & feeling the taste part); grocery store livers either raw or cooked straight up make me gag even though I enjoy the iron smell. A few days ago I fried 10 eggs on butter and for the first time in a long time they were genuinely unpleasant to eat, no clue why but this has made me despise cooking even more and I'm just going to straight up drink eggs from this point onward, reducing the amount of cooking that I do even more.

entry.title: [129] /out/ings with a pipe
entry.summary:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

entry.title: [139] I don't understand all the positive reviews. Feels like most are just trying to
entry.summary:
I don't understand all the positive reviews. Feels like most are just trying to parrot in-joke memes and have hardly played any of the game.

I tried really hard to enjoy this game, but the UI elements are so hostile. What the fuck is this hacking system with the tiny screen and weird mechanics? why are there so many buttons to control my mech in a fast-paced FPS immersive sim where each shot matters tremendously? why is money deducted every time I breathe? Why are none of the stats explained? Why do you die so unreasonably fast from aimbot AI that is somehow also braindead? Feels like any critique of this obtuse system is met with derision and snide remarks, but it seems that's a case of the emperor's new clothes from people afraid to seem like they don't "get it".

It's such a deliberately malicious experience. I really want to enjoy it but I cannot so far and I think I am in denial. I know cruelty squad was also hostile and I know the experience is meant to be like this as part of the auteur's vision, but at least CS had a pretty easy introductory level and simple mechanics: shoot, reload, zoom in, kick, crouch. that was basically it, plus the stock market and equipment It almost feels like he was insecure about his game making skills and the simple nature of CS and tried to really go all out and bit off more than he could chew. This is so fucking messy. I really do want to like it, but I am struggling. Please do try to convince me if you want.

entry.title: [ 39] I don't give a fuck what your opinion is of this game.
entry.summary:
I don't care. Your opinion is worthless to me.
The quality of health of my morning shit had a bigger impact on my thought process today than you being upset that there's a black guy in Assassin's Creed.
So shut the fuck up.
We're not doing this shit anymore It's a fucking video game.
Every goddamn game these days, oh, it's woke. Oh, there's a black guy. Oh, there's a trans person. Shut the fuck up!
Either play the game or go the fuck outside, bro. It's not that hard.

When I was a kid, guess what? If a game came out and I didn't want to get involved with it, I didn't fucking play with it. I didn't go on the internet and cry like an entitled little child.
Wah, wah, wah, wah. The game doesn't have stuff that I want. So shut the fuck up and leave!

entry.title: [462] Old school Monster Hunter >defeat monster using positioning, timing and know-h
entry.summary:
Old school Monster Hunter
>defeat monster using positioning, timing and know-how
>repeated hits mean death

Nu Monster Hunter
>click X to do cool anime thing and make big damage numbers appear. repeat 5x to win
>got hit? whatevs, click Y to get back into doing cool anime thing

Yes, OLD GOOD NEW BAD. Unironically. Not even controversial unless youre an ADHD zoomer.

entry.title: [ 88] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 166: The Many Faces Of Arcanine Edition
entry.summary:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool.
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread: >>57606559
